directive.description: Identifier or name of the directive being issued.

target.description: Optional target identifier the directive applies to.

generated_at.description: Timestamp (ISO-8601) indicating when the directive was generated.

directive_id.description: Optional UUID assigned to this directive.

previous_directive_id.description: Optional UUID of the previous directive in the chain.

chain_position.description: Optional best-effort incremental position within the directive chain.
